section.heading: District of Columbia State Athletic Association; participant eligibility documentation.

para.text: The DCSAA shall collect and maintain from member schools:
Member school or LEA decisions on participant eligibility;
Documentation of penalties a member school or LEA has imposed for eligibility violations; and
Policies on participant eligibility, the eligibility decision-making process, and penalties for eligibility violations.
The DCSAA shall issue guidance to member schools on best practices for participant eligibility policies, decision-making, and record-keeping.
